archimate:Goal.name: Produce data governance procedures
archimate:Goal.documentation: Data governance procedures and responsibilities ensure that, in terms of the creation, integration, maintenance, and use of data, projects not only consider immediate, short-term, local requirements, but also consider the wider enterprise information or data integration requirements, in line with overall business strategy. Such considerations are not to be unduly overridden by short-term time or budget constraints that disregard longer-term cost to the business of future data integration.
